text: Mikhail Mikhailovich Kokshenov (16 September 1936 - 4 June 2020) was a Russian actor, movie director and producer. He was born in Moscow. His career lasted from 1957 to 2010. His best known roles were as Zahar in Zhenya, Zhenechka and Katyusha (1967), as Karate in The Garage (1980) and as Septa in Sportloto-82 (1982). Kokshenov died on 4 June 2020 in Moscow from stroke-related problems, aged 83.Скончался актёр Михаил Кокшенов ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian voice actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian movie producers Category:Actors from Moscow
title: Mikhail Kokshenov
